version_description:
We have improved app interface a bit.
In addition, we have fixed some small, but important errors.

We have improved app interface a bit.
In addition, we have fixed some small, but important errors.
We improved app stability and fixed some errors
We improved app stability and fixed some errors

- Added new maps and addons
- Added support for German and Japanese languages

- Added new maps and addons
- Added support for German and Japanese languages

- Added buildings feature! Surprise your friends with cool buildings on your map. Now with MasterCraft you can build beautiful house just in 1 minute.
- Minor interface improvements

- Added buildings feature! Surprise your friends with cool buildings on your map. Now with MasterCraft you can build beautiful house just in 1 minute.
- Minor interface improvements
- Fixed rare application crash when trying to open comments tab
- Fixed rare application crash when trying to open comments tab

- Added content search function
- Fixed a bug due to which it was impossible to log in via Facebook

- Added content search function
- Fixed a bug due to which it was impossible to log in via Facebook
- Fixed an issue when the search did not work if 0 results were found
- Fixed an issue when the search did not work if 0 results were found

- Added new maps and addons
- Improved content download speed
- Fixed small visual issues on iPhone 11
- Fixed rare application crashes while using the skin editor

- Added new maps and addons
- Improved content download speed
- Fixed small visual issues on iPhone 11
- Fixed rare application crashes while using the skin editor

- Added new maps and addons
- Small translation improvements
- Fixed a rare error when skins might not load properly
- Fixed very rare app crash while trying to open user profile without internet

- Added new maps and addons
- Small translation improvements
- Fixed a rare error when skins might not load properly
- Fixed very rare app crash while trying to open user profile without internet

- Added support for Arabic language
- Fixed an issue when the description of the map could not be scrolled properly
- Fixed an rare issue when button "Add comments" was inactive

- Added support for Arabic language
- Fixed an issue when the description of the map could not be scrolled properly
- Fixed an rare issue when button "Add comments" was inactive

- Added alternate installation method and help page for it

We are getting many reports that old installation procedure does not work after recent updates of Minecraft and iOS. To fix this issue we have added new simple way to install content.

- Added alternate installation method and help page for it

We are getting many reports that old installation procedure does not work after recent updates of Minecraft and iOS. To fix this issue we have added new simple way to install content.

- Fixed incorrect display of the number of downloads for skins
- Fixed a rare bug due to which skins could not be installed the first time

- Fixed incorrect display of the number of downloads for skins
- Fixed a rare bug due to which skins could not be installed the first time

- Added new maps and addons
- Added login using Apple ID

- Added new maps and addons
- Added login using Apple ID
- Fixed very rare app crash when trying to download textures
- Fixed very rare app crash when trying to download textures
